ygData.subject: Re: Wizards being resisted
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh. Enchanters have a kill steal trick which is quite effective. I won t describe it, as I don t want to see more enchanters doing it. I m not saying that
ygData.messageBody:
> > Enchanters aren't supposed to be good at DD. Enchanters are for INDIRECT
> > damage. You shouldn't expect to see incredible powers. As for necros being
> > stronger...that may be true. But remember, they pay there price for it.
>
> I'd say an Enchanter( level 20) Stole a LJ kill from my group ( all level 16-20's) in oasis last night .. You figure it out .. (Btw it was 3 tanks 1 mage 1 necro)

Heh. Enchanters have a kill steal trick which is quite
effective. I won't describe it, as I don't want to see
more enchanters doing it.

I'm not saying that this person used this trick, but it
is a possibility.

Wings D'Lynn @ Karana (a magician, not an enchanter)
